name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlockChain is a database with more rules

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's just a database with extra steps. De-jargonify your web experience when it comes to blockchain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's just a database with extra steps. This extension removes the confusion of blockchain by replacing the term with the words A Database to make it easier to see what is actually being advertised.
